TextView.android:text: It is especially used for tuberculosis. It reduce pulmonary inflammation. 1] PHELANDRIUM AQUATICAM-30-Parts-Water Dropwort-
 The respiratory symptoms are most important, and have been frequently verified clinically. A very good remedy for the offensive expectoration and cough in pthisis, bronchitis and emphysema. Tuberculosis, affecting generally in middle lobes, haemoptysis, hectic and colliquative diarrhea.

2] ALLIUM CEPA-20-Parts-Onion-
 Coryza, with acrid nasal discharge, antibiotic against skin infection, mycolitic, and anti-inflammatory for expectorant and the pectoral, high BP, obesity, rheumatism, kidney diseases, chronic hepatitis, fatty degeneration of liver, stimulate hair grow, acne, sooths and makes skin more beautiful.

3] IPECACUANHA UROGOGA-20-Parts-Ipecac-root-

Use for bronchitis associated with croup in children, a severe kind of diarrhea and cancer. Especially indicated in fat children and adults, who are feeble and catch cold in relaxing atmosphere; warm, moist weather. Spasmodic affections.

6] ADIANTHUM CAPIL VENERIS-10-Parts-Maiden Hair-

A gastro-intestinal irritant with pain in stomach.
